presentation.title: Ku celceli wareysigaaga shaqada ee xiga!
presentation.message:
Qaadashada wareysiyada shaqada miyuu ku xanuunayaa walwal iyo walaac?
Laga yaabee inaad wali dareento inaan diyaar u ahayn inaad qaadato wareysiyo shaqo?
Kani waa barnaamijka kaamil ah ee lagu tababarayo xirfadahaaga wadahadalka ee goobta wareysiga shaqada!

presentation.title: Diyaar u noqo shaqadaada xigta!
presentation.message: Irganka shaqada wuxuu adeegsadaa awoodda sirdoonka macmalka ah si uu u sameeyo wareysiyo macquul ah oo uu kugu caawiyo si uu kuu hayo xirfadaha wada-hadalka ee loo baahan yahay si uu u sameeyo aragti wanaagsan oo ku saabsan shaqaalaynta dhabta ah oo kaa dhigaysa inaad u diyaarsatid wareysigaaga nolosha ee dhabta ah.

presentation.title: Diiwaangelinta Bilaashka ah:
presentation.message: Hesho warbixin dhamaadka wareysi kasta oo soo koobaya wadahadalka wakaalada jawaab celinta iyo talo ku saabsan sida loo hagaajiyo fursadahaaga lagu shaqaaleysiinayo wareysiga shaqada dhabta ah.

list.title: Taariikhda tirtir?
list.message: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad tirtirto taariikhda oo dhan?

entry.title: Tirtir wareysiga?
entry.message: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad tirtirto wareysigan?

validation.title: Khalad ansax ah
validation.invalid_fields:
Gali kaalin shaqo oo shaqo oo ansax ah oo aad ku dalbato wareysi shaqo oo cusub.
Haddii kale

color_scheme.name: Mowduuc mugdi ah
color_scheme.description:
Xulo inta u dhaxaysa iftiinka iyo mowduuca mugdiga ah.
Si otomaatig ah u dejiso mawduuca aaladda markii ugu horreysay ee aad furato barnaamijka.

language.name: Af
language.description: Xulo luqadda la doorbiday si aad u soo bandhigto inta aad isticmaaleyso arjiga oo aad lahadasho AI inta lagu gudajiro wareysiyada.

cooldown.description:
Nooca bilaashka ah ee app-ka wuxuu kuu oggolaanayaa inaad mid ka mid ah wareysato saacaddii.

Hadaad jeceshahay inaad ka saarto xadidaada, ka saar xayeysiinta, oo aad ka hesho warbixin jawaab celin ah oo ku saabsan sida loo hagaajiyo wareysi kasta, tixgeli inaad ku qorto lacag-bixinta.
cooldown.active:
Sug sugida saacadda kacsan kahor intaadan abuurin wareysi cusub.

Haddii aad jeceshahay inaad ka saarto coldenowns, ka saar xayeysiiska, oo aad ka hesho warbixin ra'yi-celin ah oo ku saabsan sida loo hagaajiyo wareysi kasta, tixgeli inaad ku qorto gudeynta.

review.request:
Haddii aad jeceshahay barnaamijka, fadlan ka fikir inaad ka baxdo dib u eegista si ay noo caawiso.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

new_interview.title: Wareysiga cusub ee la heli karo!
new_interview.message: Waxaad leedahay wareysi cusub oo aad diyaar u tahay inaad ku qaadato shaqada shaqada.

subscription.title: Lacag joogto ah
subscription.thanks: Waad ku mahadsantahay inaad iska diiwaangeliso lacagta joogtada ah! Waxaan kuu rajeyneynaa nasiib wacan iyo guul dhammaan wareysiyadaada mustaqbalka!

menu.title: Diiwaangelinta Premium

error.subscription: Khalad isku dayaya inuu xaqiijiyo iibsashadaada.
error.connection:
Khalad isku xirka.

Lama xiriirin karo dukaanka.
error.subscription_options:
Awoodin in lagu shubo qorshayaasha rukunka.

Fadlan, hubi xiriirkaaga internetka, ama mar labaad isku day mar dambe.

error.title: Khalad
error.unexpected: Waxbaa khaldamay ... Adigoo aad u arkin tan! üò±
error.connection_fix: Hubi xiriirkaaga internetka oo isku day mar dambe.

store.short_description: Ku celceli wareysigaaga shaqada ee soo socota oo ay la yeelato simulator dhabta ah
store.full_description:
Qaadashada wareysiyada shaqada miyuu ku xanuunayaa walwal iyo walaac?
Laga yaabee inaad wali dareento inaan diyaar u ahayn inaad qaadato wareysiyo shaqo?
Kani waa barnaamijka kaamil ah ee lagu tababarayo xirfadahaaga wadahadalka ee goobta wareysiga shaqada!

Sirganka shaqada wuxuu adeegsadaa awoodda sirdoonka macmalka ah si uu u sameeyo wareysiyo macquul ah oo macquul ah si uu kaaga caawiyo xakameynta xirfadaha wada-hadalka ee loo baahan yahay si uu u sameeyo aragti wanaagsan oo ku saabsan shaqaalaysiinta dhabta ah oo kaa dhigaysa inaad u diyaarsatid wareysigaaga xiga.

Wareysiyada waxaa loogu talagalay booska shaqada ee aad raadineyso, waana loo qaabeyn doonaa oo lagu hagaajin doonaa su'aalaha la xiriira yoolalkaaga si aad u fiicnaato wareysiga shaqada dhabta ah.

Isticmaalayaasha joogtada ah waxay sidoo kale heli doonaan warbixin dhamaadka wareysi kasta oo soo koobaya wadahadalka wakaalada jawaab-celinta iyo talo ku saabsan sida loo wanaajiyo fursadahaaga lagu kireysto wareysiga shaqada dhabta ah.
taglines: Ku celceli wareysigaaga shaqada ee xiga!
Ace Wareysigaaga shaqada ee xiga ee AI!
Guushaada xigta ee xirfadda soo socota ayaa halkan kugu sugaysaa!
premium_benefits: Hesho warbixinno wata jawaab celin iyo talo
Wareysi aan xadidneyn oo aan lahayn isku-dhafan
Hesho warbixinno wata-jawaabcelin iyo talo kadib wareysiyada kadib

translation.title: Caawinta turjumaada
translation.description: Caawinta u turjun arjigan luqadaha kale.
